modelDetails.description:
The Shinrai BX80 Series excavator is designed and manufactured for working in granite, marble quarrying and other heavy duty applications. Retaining the ruggedness, a variant of the machine has been made for bulk excavation as well

Specs:

Engine power: 250 PS
Operating Weight: 35400 kg
Bucket Capacity: 1.30 m³ - 2.5 m³
